contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of March, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal, No. 569 E.D. Alocatur Docket 1995, is hereby GRANTED. The order of the Superior Court is REVERSED. Commonwealth v. Banks, 540 Pa. 453, 658 A.2d 752 (1995).
It is further ordered that the Petition for Leave of Court to file communication after submission of Petition for Allowance of an Appeal is hereby DENIED.
CASTILLE, J., files a dissenting statement.
